explanation: Agent A is correct. MISRA C 2023 Rule 17.8 states that a function parameter shall not be modified. In lfs_bd_read the parameters off (lfs_off_t) and size (lfs_size_t) are value parameters (not pointers) and are modified in-place (off += diff; size -= diff;) throughout the function. That directly violates Rule 17.8. (Modifying the objects referred to by pointer parameters, e.g. rcache->off, is permitted; modifying the parameter variables themselves is not.) To comply, copy off and size into local variables and use those locals for mutation.
